name: Prembly (formerly Identitypass)
headline: Identity Verification API for Emerging Markets
description: We are making it possible for digital businesses to easily verify individuals and businesses within seconds across Emerging Markets.

founders.name: Lanre Ogungbe, Founder
founders.description: I am always delighted to think about abstract ideas. Founding team member of two startups, one of which got acquired.

founders.name: Niyi Adegboye, Founder
founders.description:
Niyi is a passionate entrepreneur with grit and believes in innovations and using technology to improve lives. 
He's a university graduate and holds a Mini_MBA certificate.  

He has wealth of experience in blinding and scaling startups. Prior to Co-founding Identity Pass, he has led product development, business growth and partnership and fundraising for three startups in EdTech, FinTech and a food ordering and delivery startup.
He has both local and international recognition.

generated_description:
Prembly, formerly known as Identitypass, is carving a niche in the landscape of identity verification APIs, specifically tailored for emerging markets. Founded in 2021 and currently part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, Prembly is based in Lagos, Nigeria, and boasts a dynamic team of 80 employees.

The mission at Prembly is straightforward yet ambitious: to enable digital businesses to verify individuals and companies rapidly and seamlessly within seconds. This is pivotal for emerging markets where robust verification processes are often lacking. By providing a solid infrastructure, Prembly is building the necessary tools for security and compliance. Their services include solutions for Know Your Customer (KYC), Know Your Business (KYB), Anti-Money Laundering (AML), Counter Financing of Terrorism (CFT), and Background Checks, all supported by advanced technology.

Currently, they are on the brink of rolling out Prembly 3.0, which promises enhanced automation and faster processing times, aiming for a more streamlined due diligence experience. Some key products they offer include IdentityForms, IdentityRadar, IdentityPass, and BackgroundChecks, ensuring comprehensive offerings for both businesses and individuals.

With notable clients like Bolt, Unilever, Mastercard, Equity, and UnionBank, Prembly is clearly making its mark. The company prides itself on its mission to “Power Greatness,” solidifying its reputation as a trusted partner in identity verification. 

For those interested to explore their offerings, visit [prembly.com](https://prembly.com) for more information or to get in touch with their sales team.
